text: A multiline text field for longer content.
slug: A URL-safe string, often used for slugs.
image: Represents an image with options like cropping and hotspots.
file: Represents a downloadable file (PDFs, documents, etc.).
array: A list of items (can include primitives or objects). Example: Tags, carousel slides, or gallery images.
block: Rich text editor for Portable Text content. Supports annotations, inline styles, and custom blocks.
reference: Links to another document or object in the dataset.
color: A color picker for choosing colors (requires the color input plugin).
crossDatasetReference: Links to a document in a different Sanity dataset.
